outline:
1. to be hot, furious, burn, become angry, be kindled
    1. (Qal) to burn, kindle (anger)
    2. (Niphal) to be angry with, be incensed
    3. (Hiphil) to burn, kindle
    4. (Hithpael) to heat oneself in vexation
kjv_def: be angry, burn, be displeased, [idiom] earnestly, fret self, grieve, be (wax) hot, be incensed, kindle, [idiom] very, be wroth. See H8474 (תַּחָרָה).
strongs_def: to glow or grow warm; figuratively (usually) to blaze up, of anger, zeal, jealousy
